TEXT: A lovely little girl who loves singing. NL Perhaps has other forms?
NL Clasping the microphone, your voice begins to flow like a river...
NL You cast upon it a gaze of tranquil contemplation...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Little~ ~girl,~ ~why~ ~are~ ~you~ ~all~ #y~alone~ ~here?~ ~The~ ~Spire~ ~can~ ~be~ ~very~ #r@dangerous.@ ~Join~ ~us,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
